mapper.insert: insert into tbl_employee (employee_id, employee_name, login_name, password, department_id, gender, age, email, telephone, is_valid, creator_id, gmt_create, modifier_id, gmt_modified) values (#{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValid,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tbl_employee set employee_name = #{employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, age = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=BIT}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT te.employee_id, te.employee_name, te.department_id, te.login_name, te.password, te.is_valid, te.gender, te.age, te.email, te.telephone, te.creator, te.gmt_create, te.modifier, te.gmt_modified FROM tbl_employee te where te.employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT te.employee_id, te.employee_name, te.department_id, td.department_name AS departmentName, te.login_name, te.password, te.is_valid, te.gender, te.age, te.email, te.telephone, te.creator_id, crea.employee_name AS creator, te.gmt_create, te.modifier_id, modi.employee_name AS modifier, te.gmt_modified FROM tbl_employee te LEFT JOIN tbl_department td ON te.department_id = td.department_id LEFT JOIN tbl_employee crea ON te.creator_id = crea.employee_id LEFT JOIN tbl_employee modi ON te.modifier_id = modi.employee_id where 1=1
